message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value, but I'm willing to negotiate further.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $12,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?

I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle, but $19,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
